import './style.scss' import { Row, Col, Image, Button } from "antd" import axios from "axios" import React, {useState, useEffect} from "react" import { useAuthState } from "../../../hooks/useAuth" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" const AvatarSide = ({userEmail, userImage}) => { const { user, cookies } = useAuthState() const [userImageAvata,setUserImageAvatar] = useState(null); useEffect(()=> { const getUsers = async () => { const res = await axios.get( `/api/users?email=${userEmail}` ) // setUser(res.data.results) setUserImageAvatar(res?.data[user.id-1]?.userImage); // console.log(res); } getUsers() },[userEmail]) return (

Trang cá nhân
{cookies['gp_token']? ( ):( ) }

{user.username}

{user.name}
Thông tin liên hệ: {user.userPhoneNumber}
Email: {user.email}
Địa chỉ: {user.userProvinceID.userProvinceName}
Xếp hạng: 5/5
 ) } export default AvatarSide
